attributes.action: Make cctv mandatory to all nurseries and schools
attributes.additional_details: Because the nursery management will never will to pay extra for things like this so the government must enforce this to all nurseries ans schools
attributes.background: To force nurseries and schools to have cctv in operation for the safety of children

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require CCTV in all early years settings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750797
